summary: The MkDocs AI Hooks project enhances technical documentation and blogs with AI-driven summary generation and intelligent reading statistics using MkDocs hooks. Key features include AI-generated summaries, multi-language support, intelligent content cleaning, flexible configuration, and efficient caching. It also offers precise Chinese character counting, code detection, estimated reading time, and visually appealing information display. The tool supports automatic language recognition, content type detection, cache optimization, error handling, and advanced API integration for various AI services. Installation involves downloading Python files and configuring directories, while usage includes setting up AI summary directories and DeepSeek API. The project aims to provide cost-effective AI summaries and advanced customization options for users.
